database/sql: fix Tx.Query

Fixes issue 2784

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5574073

Committer: Brad Fitzpatrick <bradfitz@golang.org>

For future reference, the external test (to test the sqlite, mysql, and
postgres drivers) was:

https://github.com/bradfitz/go-sql-test/commit/24162a1ac0c095536b713ff4572ba3884c9859b6

... also from Blake.
